name: Cuby Monster
description:
A game for the Kenney Jam 2022.

Unfortunately I had to withdraw because I had setbacks and for health reasons I can't overexert my body. I also liked the idea so in the not too distant future this game will be released for android phones and its development will continue.

Only the introduction is developed, please come back in a few weeks and now don't waste your time. <3

21/8/22
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
